name: Geodude

evolution.description: Geodude can evolve into Graveler at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Rock Pokémon. Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
